preqs: Completion of second year-level Italian language or equivalent knowledge

rules.ruleString: (Must have passed 2 (I/W) units in {ATS2223, ATS2224} or  Must have passed 2 (I/W) units in {ATS2231, ATS2232} or  Must have passed 2 (I/W) units in {ATS2225, ATS2226})

description: The aim of the subject is to introduce students to the works of Dante Alighieri, the most important poet of the Middle Ages, through a reading of the 'Divina Commedia'.
